title: Furry Transporter

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, transport two players
- You may transport a Coven member to safety, giving them powerful defense tonight.
- **With the Necronomicon:**You may transport another player to hell, dealing a powerful attack to them and cleaning them. If they're immune, they will be RB'd for the rest of the game

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-  **With the Necronomicon:**You learn the roles of who you transport. You won't learn who's who, though.
- You may only transport each individual Coven member once.

desc:
Post 4111
*There was some thread way back when on the ToS wiki with some sort of smut thread, idk when it was, but this is the only thing I remember about it.*
